data.text:
@LindseyGrahamSC @Europarl_EN,@realDonaldTrump,and the all of the world:
If you truly support the Iranian people, speak with @PahlaviReza.He is our leader.
The Iranian people and those killed in the streets—call his name.Thank you.
#KingRezaPahlavi @kajakallas  @FoxNews #MeetOurKing  #جاويدشاه‌

@LindseyGrahamSC Whatever agreement you make, after the end of Trump's term in the White House, the regime will break the agreement. Islam is a religion of deception and lies. Politics mixed with Islam is very treacherous and criminal.
@LindseyGrahamSC 🕊️🕊️Listen to Iran’s streets, not the Islamic regime’s rulers. @StateDept @HouseForeign #RezaPahlaviForIran #KingRezaPahlavi #IranMassacre #IranRevolution2026
@LindseyGrahamSC No nuclear deal should ignore human rights crimes😔. @UNHumanRights @ICC_CPI #RezaPahlaviForIran #KingRezaPahlavi #IranMassacre #IranRevolution2026

@LindseyGrahamSC These are not rulers or governments, they are a criminal sect. The ayatollahs are dangerous to civilization and humanity. Iran's wealth in their hands is more dangerous than nuclear weapons. Destroy them to ensure human civilization and freedom in the world.

@LindseyGrahamSC I’m an Iranian and lived most of my life under discrimination and suppression of Mullah’s regime, and can tell you it’s a big mistake trusting Mullahs for any kind of deal. Betrayal and disloyalty is in their blood and there is precious time getting wasted that can save lives.
@LindseyGrahamSC Iranians didn’t give their blood for a better nuclear deal, any deal betrays a nation fighting for freedom. #NoDealWithIRGC #nodealwithmullahs #IranMassacre

@LindseyGrahamSC The people of Iran will not stop resisting until the revolution succeeds.Tonight,Tehran once again smells like protests.we know IR will not stop its crimes until it reaches its goal of destroying Israel and the United States with nuclear weapons. Stand up against these killers.
